msbt.message: Thank you so much for helping us out with our big photo shoot! I'm sending you a gift to express our gratitude. My darling Cy-Guy made it, so take good care of it, OK?
I'm sending you the thank-you gift I forgot to give you last time. You can trade in heart crystals for a darling item. Just chat with my sweet Cy-Guy to make a trade!
Hey, squirt! Thanks a bunch for all the help on the big photo shoot! Your is attachedâ€”the one you traded your heart crystals for, yeah? You better take care of it!
Heya, squirt! Attached, please find the wedding wand recipe that I couldn't give you the other day. Try it out! Just wanted to say thanks for all your help. The missus and I really appreciate it.
Thank you for the fabulous party! Please take this small token of our appreciation. My darling and I wanted to share our happiness with you.
